minigame.label.showCubes.singular.translation: Put {0} Cube in front of Cozmo. It will turn white when he can see it.

minigame.label.showCubes.plural.translation: Put {0} Cubes in front of Cozmo. They'll turn white when he can see them.

minigame.label.cozmoPrep.translation: Cozmo is getting ready to play...

droneMode.safePlay.description.translation:
- Explore indoors in well lit spaces
- Drive on flat surfaces
- Be careful of falling off edges
- Stay close to Cozmo for the best experience

droneMode.text.howToPlaySteering.translation: Tilt your device to steer Cozmo left and right.

droneMode.text.howToPlaySpeed.translation:
Drag and hold to move Cozmo forward or backward.
Let go to stop.

droneMode.text.toggleNightVision.translation: Tap to toggle Nightvision On or Off

droneMode.text.raiseLowerHead.translation: Drag to move Cozmo's Head or Lift Up and Down

droneMode.text.switchHeadOrLift.translation: Tap to switch between Head and Lift Control

droneMode.text.cozmoReticleHeader.translation: When Cozmo selects an object you can see it here

droneMode.text.reticleOutlineDescrip.translation: An outline will appear around the selected object

droneMode.text.cozmoInteractionChoice.translation: Tap on the options that appear to make Cozmo interact

memoryMatchGame.howToPlay.translation:
You and Cozmo will take turns.
As the Cubes flash, memorize the pattern. Then tap the Cubes in order to repeat it.

memoryMatchGame.solo.howToPlay.translation:
You play while Cozmo watches.
As the Cubes flash, memorize the pattern, then repeat it.

memoryMatchGame.difficulty.hardDescripti.translation: Unlock by winning Memory Match VS mode.

memoryMatchGame.label.placeCenter.translation:
Put 1 Cube in front of Cozmo, and two others on either side.

Leave space in-between.

speedTap.tapBlock.translation:
Tap a flashing Cube you
want to play with

speedTap.tapBlockForRound.translation: Tap your Cube to begin the next round.

minigame.dontMoveCozmo.description.translation: Cozmo has moved and can't continue the game.

minigame.lostTrackOfBlock.description.translation: One of the Cubes has disconnected. Visit Settings to learn more about troubleshooting Cubes.

minigame.timeout.description.translation: Cozmo is tired of waiting, and wants to do other things.

cubePounce.info.playerWinPoint.translation: You were too fast for Cozmo!

cubePounce.info.cozmoWinPoint.translation: He was too fast for you!

cubePounce.info.setupText.translation: Place a Cube in front of Cozmo and hold it still when it turns green.

cubePounce.header.pushCubeTowardCozmo.translation: Slowly push the Cube towards Cozmo... but not too close!

speedTap.difficulty.easyDescription.translation: Be the first to tap your Cube when the colors match, but never tap on red!

speedTap.difficulty.mediumDescription.translation: Tap your Cube first when the patterns match, but Cubes may now have either 1 or 2 colors.

speedTap.difficulty.hardDescription.translation: Watch out! Cube patterns can be more complex, with up to 3 colors at a time.

speedTap.difficulty.expertDescription.translation: Experts only! Cubes can now have up to 4 colors at once, challenging even the best players.

speedTap.difficulty.mediumDescription.lo.translation:
Two Color Mode is Locked
Unlock by winning Quick Tap in One Color Mode.

speedTap.difficulty.hardDescription.lock.translation:
Three Color Mode is Locked
Unlock by winning Quick Tap in Two Color Mode.

speedTap.difficulty.expertDescription.lo.translation:
Four Color Mode is Locked
Unlock by winning Quick Tap in Three Color Mode.

speedTap.text.MP.Locked.translation: To unlock 3 player mode, play Human vs Cozmo once on this difficulty.

cozmoSays.instructions.label.translation: Type a word or phrase and hear Cozmo say it

minigame.GuardDog.Desc.translation:
Try to slowly and carefully turn all of Cozmo's cubes upside down without waking him up.

Careful... Cozmo can sense when his cubes are moving!

speedTap.driveToCubeFail.description.translation: Cozmo is having trouble finding his cube. Please make sure Cozmo can see it.
